PMUL4648.json.usr: Please find a restaurant called Nusha.
PMUL4648.json.sys: I don't seem to be finding anything called Nusha.  What type of food does the restaurant serve?

PMUL4648.json.usr: I am not sure of the type of food but could you please check again and see if you can find it? Thank you.
PMUL4648.json.sys: Could you double check that you've spelled the name correctly? The closest I can find is Nandos.

PMUL4648.json.usr: It's not a restaurant, it's an attraction. Nusha.
PMUL4648.json.sys: oh its okay. that is an entertainment type located in the south at unit g6, cambridge leisure park, clifton road. do you need their phone number?

PMUL4648.json.usr: No, but please confirm their address again and their postcode.
PMUL4648.json.sys: Their address is Unit g6, Cambridge Leisure Park, Clifton road. The postcode is CB17DY. Is their anything else I can do for you?

PMUL4648.json.usr: I want Indian food in the centre area.
PMUL4648.json.sys: There are nine Indian restaurants in centre what price range do you want?

PMUL4648.json.usr: I am looking for expensive Indian food.
PMUL4648.json.sys: saffron brasserie is an expensive restaurant that serves italian food

PMUL4648.json.usr: Can I get the address for saffron brasserie?
PMUL4648.json.sys: the address is Hills Road City Centre

PMUL4648.json.usr: Can I clarify that it was Indian food and not Italian food please?
PMUL4648.json.sys: Yes, saffron brasserie is Indian food.

PMUL4648.json.usr: Thank you that is all the information I need at the moment.
PMUL4648.json.sys: i hope i have been of help
I am glad to help. Enjoy your stay!

MUL2499.json.usr: I am looking for a cheap restaurant in the center of the city.
MUL2499.json.sys: Do you have any specific type of food you would like?

MUL2499.json.usr: No, I'm not picky as long as the prices are low.
MUL2499.json.sys: There is a cheap Chinese restaurant called the Dojo Noodle Bar located in the centre of town. Would you like to book a table?

MUL2499.json.usr: Yes please, for 8 people at 18:30 on thursday.
MUL2499.json.sys: I am sorry but dojo noodle bar is solidly booked at that time. I can try a different time or day for you.

MUL2499.json.usr: Can you try to book it at 17:30.
MUL2499.json.sys: All set. Your reference number is K2BO09VQ.

MUL2499.json.usr: Thanks.  I'm also looking for some entertainment close to the restaurant.  Any suggestions?
MUL2499.json.sys: I am sorry I do not have any attractions meeting the criteria you listed. Is there another type of attraction or area you would like me to search?

MUL2499.json.usr: Why don't you try an architectural attraction, instead.
MUL2499.json.sys: All saints church looks good, would you like to head there?

MUL2499.json.usr: Yes please. Can you let me know what the entrance fee is too?
I also need to book a taxi between the restaurant and the church.
MUL2499.json.sys: What time would you like the taxi to pick you up from Dojo Noodle Bar?
Your taxi is booked. The car is a blue bmw and the contact number is 07239644669. Is there anything else I can help you with?

MUL2499.json.usr: Thanks! I will definitely try to.
MUL2499.json.sys: Great! Goodbye and have a nice day.

MUL1575.json.usr: I would like to find a particular restaurant in Cambridge. The name of the restaurant is Restaurant Two Two.  Could you give me the location?
MUL1575.json.sys: Restaurant Two Two is nice French restaurant located at 22 Chesterton Road Chesterton. Would like me to book you a table?

MUL1575.json.usr: That would be great. I need it for 8 on friday.
MUL1575.json.sys: Do you have a time preference?

MUL1575.json.usr: yes at  11:15 if that's not available i can do 10:15
MUL1575.json.sys: The booking for 10:15 was successful they will reserve the table for 15 minutes. The reference number is 6B5Z7VJ5.

MUL1575.json.usr: Thanks. Can you help me find a train, too? I want to leave Cambridge some time after 12:15.
MUL1575.json.sys: And where would you like your train to take you?

MUL1575.json.usr: I need the train should go to peterborough and it should leave on saturday.
MUL1575.json.sys: How about train TR3934? It leaves at 12:34 & arrives at 13:24. Travel time is 50 minutes.

MUL1575.json.usr: That sounds fine.  Can I get tickets for my whole group please?
MUL1575.json.sys: OK, the total fee for your group will be 105.60 GBP, payable at the station. Your reference number is 6YHB3TYA.

MUL1575.json.usr: Thanks so much! That's all I needed for today.
MUL1575.json.sys: You're welcome! Have a great trip!

MUL0671.json.usr: I'm looking for a train that leaves on Saturday and arrives by 10.30
MUL0671.json.sys: Where are you traveling to and from?

MUL0671.json.usr: I am going to cambridge from birmingham new street.
MUL0671.json.sys: There are 5 trains available, may I book one for you that leaves at 7:40 and arrives at 10:23?

MUL0671.json.usr: Yes, that train sounds good. Please book it for me. Could you also find me a hotel with a moderate price that offers internet?
MUL0671.json.sys: Before we start on the hotel, did you need tickets for the train?

MUL0671.json.usr: No thank you, I was just pre-planning a route.
MUL0671.json.sys: There are 17 hotels listed. What part of town would you like to stay in?

MUL0671.json.usr: The north part of town please, preferably in a guesthouse.
MUL0671.json.sys: Cambridge has 8 moderately priced guesthouses in the north.  I would suggest Acorn Guest House, with a star rating of 4.  Would you like me to book it?

MUL0671.json.usr: Yes please, I would like to book it for 7 people for 5 nights on Saturday, and I need a reference number.
MUL0671.json.sys: I'm very sorry I was unable to book at acorn guest house for 5 nights, would you like to try for a shorter stay?

MUL0671.json.usr: Yes, please try to book it for four nights instead.
MUL0671.json.sys: Your booking was successful, the reference number is WAEYAQ0M.  May I assist you with anything else today?

MUL0671.json.usr: No, that should be all for now. Thank you for the help!
MUL0671.json.sys: You are welcome, have a great trip!

PMUL2636.json.usr: I am staying in Cambridge soon and would like to stay at a and b guest house.
PMUL2636.json.sys: Sure, how many days and how many people?

PMUL2636.json.usr: we are staying 6 people for 4 nights starting from Tuesday. i need the reference number
PMUL2636.json.sys: Your booking is successful! Your reference number is IIGRA0MI. Do you need anything else?

PMUL2636.json.usr: Yeas, what to recommend if I want to see good architecture in the west part of town?
PMUL2636.json.sys: Unfortunately there is no good architecture on the west end but I can look in other parts of town if you want
What part of town there are none in the west.

PMUL2636.json.usr: There are no museums in the west at all?
PMUL2636.json.sys: sorry about that, there are actually seven in that area.

PMUL2636.json.usr: Great, can I get the postcode, entrance fee and address of one of them?
PMUL2636.json.sys: cafe jello gallery has a free entrance fee. The address is cafe jello gallery, 13 magdalene street and the post code is cb30af. Can I help you with anything else?

PMUL2636.json.usr: Yes please. I need a taxi to commute.
PMUL2636.json.sys: When would you like to leave and arrive?

PMUL2636.json.usr: I'd like to get to the Gallery by 13:45, please.
PMUL2636.json.sys: Sure, lookout for a blue Volvo the contact number is 07941424083. Can I help with anything else?

PMUL2636.json.usr: That's all for now.  Thank you so much.
PMUL2636.json.sys: You are very welcome! Don't hesitate to check back if anything else comes up that you'd like assistance with. Goodbye!

PMUL3027.json.usr: I am staying in the centre of town for the weekend, what is there to do there?
PMUL3027.json.sys: We have several things to do! Architecture, colleges, museums...What type of attraction are you most interested in?

PMUL3027.json.usr: It doesn't matter but can you recommend one and give me the entrance fee?
PMUL3027.json.sys: I recommend castle galleries and it's free to get in!

PMUL3027.json.usr: Thanks! I'm also looking for a train that leaves Leicester.
PMUL3027.json.sys: I have plenty of trains departing from Leicester, what destination did you have in mind?

PMUL3027.json.usr: I'd like to go to Cambridge.  I want to leave on Monday and arrive by 16:15.
PMUL3027.json.sys: TR0330 departs at 14:09 and arrives by 15:54. Would you like a ticket?

PMUL3027.json.usr: What is the total travel time?
PMUL3027.json.sys: 105 minutes is the total travel time. Can I help you with anything else?

PMUL3027.json.usr: Would you be able to help me book this?
I would just like to find a train first, and get the info. I think I have the info I needed.
PMUL3027.json.sys: Great. Is there anything else that you need help with?

PMUL3027.json.usr: No, I think that's all I need for now. Thank you so much for your help!
you have been of great help

MUL1489.json.usr: Are there any Catalan restaurants in the centre of town?
MUL1489.json.sys: I'm sorry, there are no Catalan dining establishments in the city centre. Would you like to look for a different cuisine or area?

MUL1489.json.usr: Actually, can you try anything that serves French food?
MUL1489.json.sys: I have the cote in the centre. It is in the expensive range. Would you like to make a booking?

MUL1489.json.usr: Yes, please. I need a table for 8 on Friday at 17:30, please.
MUL1489.json.sys: Ok, you are all set for cote on Friday, table for 8 at 17:30.  Can I help with anything else?

MUL1489.json.usr: Can I have the reference number for the reservation please?
MUL1489.json.sys: Booking was unsuccessful. Can you try another time slot?
One moment while I try to make the reservation of table for 8, Friday at 16:30.

MUL1489.json.usr: If 16:30 is available, I'll need the reference number, too, please.
MUL1489.json.sys: I've got you booked for 16:30.  The reference number is EQ0YAQ1G.

MUL1489.json.usr: Great thanks. I also need a train, one leaving peterborough and arriving at Cambridge by 11:15?
MUL1489.json.sys: There are lots to choose from under that criteria. What day would you like to travel on?

MUL1489.json.usr: I would like it for Friday, please. Can you please provide a reference number as well?
MUL1489.json.sys: Ok great, I was able to book you on train TR4296 departing 09:48 and arriving 10:38.  The reference number is P3AGODMA.  Can I assist you with anything else?

MUL1489.json.usr: Thank you, I won't be needing anything else.
MUL1489.json.sys: I'm happy to have been able to help you today.  Take care.

SNG01608.json.usr: Are there any Portuguese restaurants in Cambridge?
SNG01608.json.sys: Yes there is a Portuguese restaurant in Cambridge  with two different locations, would you like the addresses?

SNG01608.json.usr: If one of them has a moderate price range please give me that address. If not tell me about Turkish restaurants instead.
SNG01608.json.sys: I have two Turkish restuarants, both in the centre and both expensive. May I recommend anatolia?

SNG01608.json.usr: Actually I need a moderately priced restaurant. Are there any fitting that description?
SNG01608.json.sys: I am sorry. I mistook that price range. The Anatolia is in the moderate range. Would that work for you?

SNG01608.json.usr: Yes, I need a reservation for 1 people at 14:00 on monday.
SNG01608.json.sys:
Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is: 96ZYHLN1.

SNG01608.json.usr: Thanks so much. That's all for today. Bye!

SNG0888.json.usr: We need to find a guesthouse of moderate price.
SNG0888.json.sys: I can help you with that.  Do you have any special area you would like to stay?  Or possibly a star request for the guesthouse?

SNG0888.json.usr: I would like it to have a 3 star rating.
SNG0888.json.sys: The Bridge Guest House is a 3 star guesthouse. It is in the south area. Would you like to book a room?
How many people is the reservation for?
I am afraid that booking is unsuccessful. Would you like a different day or amount of days?

SNG0888.json.usr: How about 1 night?  Would that work?
SNG0888.json.sys: This booking is successful for 1 night. Your reference number is 85BGKWO4. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
Great, have a pleasant stay.  Bye.

MUL1598.json.usr: I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the north area
MUL1598.json.sys: I have moderate and expensive priced restaurants. City stop restaurant serves european and is on the expensive side. Or may I suggest saigon city, they have asian?

MUL1598.json.usr: Do any of them specialize in chinese?
MUL1598.json.sys: Yes, both Hakka and The Hotpot serve Chinese.  Can I book either for you?

MUL1598.json.usr: Lets try Hakka. It will be just myself at 16:45 on tuesday.
MUL1598.json.sys:
Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes.
Reference number is: KWV7HGEB.

MUL1598.json.usr: Great, thank you. Can you help me with train schedules too? I need to get to Cambridge from Bishops Stortford.
MUL1598.json.sys: On what day will you be traveling?

MUL1598.json.usr: I will be traveling on Tuesday and it should arrive in Cambridge by 12:45.
MUL1598.json.sys: There are 4 trains that will arrive before 12:45, do you have a preferred departure time?

MUL1598.json.usr: No, any will be fine.  I only need a ticket for myself.
MUL1598.json.sys: I was able to book the 11:29 train which arrives at 12:07. The cost is 10.1 GBP and your reference is AAX97X46. Anything else I can assist you with?

MUL1598.json.usr: No thank you.  Appreciate your help.
MUL1598.json.sys: It was my pleasure. Have a great day!
